description: Richard Wadani was drafted to fight for Nazi Germany in 1939, but deserted and switched sides.
title: Richard Wadani: Austrian Nazi deserter dies aged 97
title_page: Richard Wadani: Austrian Nazi deserter dies aged 97 - BBC News
maintext: "She said this regime must go, and she supported me when we spoke about me deserting from the army. She gave me a white cloth, for safety, when I surrendered. I had it with me for years."
